sf168:5: athāyuṣmān sandhākātyāyano yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma | upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte ’sthāt | ekāntasthita āyuṣmān sandhākātyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat |
sf168:6: samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagdṛṣṭir iti bhadanta ucyate | kiyatā samyagdṛṣṭir bhavati | kiyatā tathāgataḥ samyagdṛṣtiṁ prajñapayamānaḥ prajñapayati |
sf168:7: evam ukto bhagavān āyuṣmantaṁ sandhākātyāyanam idam avocat |
sf168:8: dvayaṁ niśrito ’yaṁ kātyāyana loko yad bhūyasāstitāñ ca niśrito nāstitāñ ca | upadhyupādānavinibaddho ’yaṁ kātyāyana loko yad utāstitāñ ca niśrito nāstitāñ ca | etāni ced upadhyupādānāni cetaso ’dhiṣṭhānābhiniveśānuśayān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśaty ātmā meti |
sf168:9: duḥkham idam utpadyamānam utpadyate | duḥkhaṁ nirudhyamānaṁ nirudhyate | atra cen na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati | aparapratyayaṁ jñānam evāsya bhavati |
sf168:10: iyatā kātyāyana samyagdṛṣṭir bhavati | iyatā tathāgataḥ samyagdṛṣṭiṁ prajñapaymānaḥ prajñapayati |
sf168:11: tat kasmād dhetoḥ | lokasamudayaṁ kātyāyana yathābhūtaṁ samyakprajñayā paśyato yā loke nāstitā sā na bhavati | lokanirodhaṁ yathābhūtaṁ samyakprajñayā paśyato yā loke ’stitā sā na bhavati |
sf168:12: ity etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamya madhyamayā pratipadā tathāgato dharmaṁ deśayati |
sf168:13: yad utāsmin satīdaṁ bhavaty asyotpādād idam utpadyate | yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṁskārā iti pūrvavad yāvat samudayo nirodhaś ca bhavati |
sf168:14: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇa āyuṣmataḥ sandhākātyāyanasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṁ vimuktam |
